title: Carlos Moreno Wanted to Improve Cities. Conspiracy Theorists Are Coming for Him.
description: Researchers like Carlos Moreno, the professor behind a popular urban planning concept, are struggling with conspiracy theories and death threats.

title: A Campaign Aide Didn’t Write That Email. A.I. Did.
description: The swift advance of artificial intelligence in politics is already blurring the boundaries between fact and fake.

title: In Hundreds of TikTok Videos, Its Users Defend the App
description: After lawmakers grilled TikTok’s chief executive last week, the app’s users argued that the platform should not be banned in the United States over national security concerns.

title: How Chatbots and Large Language Models, or LLMs, Actually Work
description: Learning how a “large language model” operates.

title: Tinkering With ChatGPT, Workers Wonder: Will This Take My Job?
description: Artificial intelligence is confronting white-collar professionals more directly than ever. It could make them more productive — or obsolete.
